title: Surgical repair of aortoventricular tunnel connected to the apex of the right ventricle in a neonate.
abstract: We describe a neonate in whom early symptoms of heart failure developed because of a rare aorta-right ventricular tunnel connected to the apex of the right ventricle. Successful immediate surgical repair was carried out with closure of both ends of the tunnel.
categories: Congenital Hereditary and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
